CustomField.description: Checks if Key Account thresholds are met for ACV and deal stage
CustomField.formula:
AND( OR( AND(Probability >= 0.35, Probability <= 1.0), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost") ), OR( (SE_Key_Account_Override__c = true), AND (
OR( AND( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"SLED"), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=75000))), AND( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE2"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"US"), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=50000), AND( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE3"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"US"), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=125000),
AND(Account.BillingCountry="Canada", ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=50000*1.4), AND(Account.Global_Geography__c = "Mexico", ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>= (58411.21495*17.12)), AND(Account.Global_Geography__c="UK & I",ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=(50000*0.86)), AND(Account.Global_Geography__c="France",ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=(30000* 0.98)), AND(Account.Global_Geography__c="DACH",ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=(30000 * 0.98)), AND(Account.Global_Geography__c="BENELUX",ACV_Bookings_SOT__c>=(20000* 0.98)) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checks if Key Account thresholds are met for ACV and deal stage
CustomField.label: SE Key Account
